title: Industrial Chemical Process Design - Douglas Erwin
description:
Industrial Chemical Process Design - Douglas Erwin (McGraw-Hill, 2002).pdf

This text aims to provide solutions to some of the most complex problems in chemical process design - for example, sizing equipment, estimating cost for modular packages and performing such operations as liquid-liquid extraction and gas in liquid separation vessel sizing and rating. Complex operations and formulas are explained in an easy to understand format
